abstracts.cdata!:
The Integrated Coastal and Marine
            Resource Management Project aims to increase the sustainable
            management of marine and coastal resources in three pilot
            areas by communities and the Government. The closing date
            for the project will be extended from December 1, 2011 until
            May 1st, 2012. This is the second extension of the project.
            Including the extension of 18 months already approved as
            part of the mid-term restructuring in May 2010, the total
            extension of the original closing date is 23 months.
